overview: Jim joined the company as Chief Financial Officer where his primary responsibility will be to manage Vivonetâ€™s finances, finance operations and process improvements. Born and raised in Vancouver, British Columbia, Jim has held controller level positions with Cisco Systems and PMC-Sierra. Most recently, Jim was the Vice President of Finance at Absolute Software. He qualified as a Chartered Accountant with KPMG in 1995 and as a Chartered Financial Analyst in 2001. In 2009, Jim completed the Advanced Management Program at Harvard Business School.
